summary: This bill addresses the issue of "Misbehaving Content Scrapers," likely focusing on controlling automated web scraping activities. It references the use of robots.txt for proper etiquette, IP rate limiting to prevent abuse, and suggests the use of the GPO.gov Bulk Data Download service as an alternative for accessing government data. The bill implicitly aims to regulate data access and potentially protect government websites from excessive scraping, focusing on fair use and resource management.
